feature_request: Tasting Session Navigation and Item Revisiting
description: Users need the ability to navigate back to previous tasting items during an active session to modify notes, scores, or add additional information before completing the tasting session.

current_ui_flow.session_creation: Users create a tasting session with category selection
current_ui_flow.item_addition: Users add items one by one through 'Add First Item' button
current_ui_flow.item_editing: Each item can be edited individually with notes, aroma, flavor, scores
current_ui_flow.navigation: Linear progression through items with next/previous buttons
current_ui_flow.completion: Session ends when user completes all items

existing_navigation.current_limitations: No way to jump to specific items or see item list during session

identified_todos.description: Make the 'Tasting 1111' title appear as an editable text field instead of requiring users to click to discover editability
identified_todos.current_behavior: Title is editable by clicking but doesn't look editable
identified_todos.proposed_solution: Add visual indicators (underline, edit icon, or input styling) to show editability
identified_todos.implementation_notes: Similar to how item names are handled in TastingItem component with hover states

identified_todos.description: Remove the 'No Items Yet' empty state card and start directly with item creation page
identified_todos.current_behavior: Shows empty state with 'Add First Item' button before starting tasting
identified_todos.proposed_solution: Skip empty state and go directly to item 1 creation page
identified_todos.implementation_notes: Modify phase logic to start in 'tasting' phase instead of 'setup' phase

identified_todos.description: Add a dropdown or navigation component to allow users to jump to any previous item during an active tasting session
identified_todos.current_behavior: Users can only go to previous/next item sequentially
identified_todos.proposed_solution: Add item list dropdown or sidebar showing all items with ability to jump to any item
identified_todos.implementation_notes: Need to track current item index and allow setting it to any valid index

identified_todos.description: Show aroma and flavor inputs in the tasting summary screen for better overview
identified_todos.current_behavior: Summary only shows item names, scores, and notes
identified_todos.proposed_solution: Expand summary to include aroma and flavor fields in the detailed view
identified_todos.implementation_notes: Database already stores aroma and flavor fields, just need to display them

identified_todos.description: Remove unnecessary blind tasting settings for quick tasting mode since it's single-user
identified_todos.current_behavior: Quick tasting shows blind tasting options that aren't relevant
identified_todos.proposed_solution: Hide or remove blind tasting settings for quick mode
identified_todos.implementation_notes: Add conditional rendering based on tasting mode

technical_requirements.database_changes: None required - existing schema supports all needed functionality
new_components_needed: ItemNavigationDropdown - dropdown showing all items with jump functionality
ItemListSidebar - optional sidebar view of all items
modified_components: QuickTastingSession.tsx - add navigation controls and item jumping
QuickTastingSummary.tsx - enhance display of aroma/flavor data
EditTastingDashboard.tsx - conditional rendering for quick mode

state_management.navigation_state: Need to add ability to set current item index to any value

user_experience_goals.primary: Allow users to easily revisit and modify any previous item during a tasting session
secondary: Reduce friction in the initial tasting flow
Improve visual clarity of editable elements
Streamline settings for quick tasting mode

phase_1: Add item navigation dropdown to QuickTastingSession
phase_2: Remove empty state and start directly with item creation
Improve visual indicators for editable elements
phase_3: Enhance summary display with aroma/flavor data
Clean up unnecessary settings for quick mode

functional: Users can navigate to any previous item during active session
Users can modify notes, scores, and other data on previous items
Navigation is intuitive and doesn't disrupt tasting flow
ux: Reduced friction in starting new tasting sessions
Clear visual indicators for interactive elements
